analysis

Interface ICategory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAnalysisResult, IMultilingual, IReadable, IReadableXML, ISaveableXML
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryImpl

    public interface ICategory
extends IAnalysisResult, IMultilingual, ISaveableXML, IReadableXML
    This is a base interface for objects of type "category"
    Author:
    Pdz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ICategory.XMLTags
      This enumeration defines all tags that are used when writing / reading category data to / from an XML file

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String keywordsSeparator
      String constant, used to identify individual keywords within a category
